title: Fat/chubby/bubble/rounded/serif
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317123621im_/http:/typophile.com/files/muscle_6276.png)

Seeing if anyone can help me identify this font, from the little flesh-toned M.U.S.C.L.E. toys that were so popular during the 1980s.

Anything near to it is also appreciated (I've investigated Frankfurter/Frankfurt, but it's not quite there)

Thanks!  
Joey
author: joeygee

comments.content:
Can't find an exact match, but you may like  
 **[Chwast Buffalo (Black Condensed)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317123621/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Linotype%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=Chwast%20Buffalo%20Pro%20-%20Black%20Condensed&fid=a97045b6e7bb7ed5e47d3924e0224994&fsize=60&text=MUSCLE&fit=1)** by Linotype,  
or **[Debusen](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317123621/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Typodermic%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=Debusen%20-%20Regular&fid=8bebb919b8c58ff1a75a1607e3d8efd0&fsize=60&text=MUSCLE&fit=1)** by Ray Larabie [Typodermic, 2008]

Thanks a lot, those are nice! Definite fallbacks if I can't track the original down.

Appreciate it!
